title: Privacy
notificationsBlockedDesc: You can enable them in your browser settings.
locationDeniedDesc: You can enable it in your browser settings.
guarantee1: Face blur is processed locally on your device
guarantee2: Temporary images are automatically deleted after 7 days
guarantee3: Your original photos are never shared with third parties
whenCamera: When do we use the camera?
whenCameraDesc: Only when you click to capture a clothing photo, do a color analysis, or create an avatar for the virtual try-on.
whatLocalDesc: Face blur is applied on your device before any upload. Image quality analysis also happens locally.
whatServer: What is sent to the server?
whatServerDesc: Only images needed for the virtual try-on and color analysis are sent, with face blur already applied (if enabled).
howRevokeDesc: You can revoke permissions at any time in your browser or device settings. Click "How to enable" above for instructions.
